attributes.action: Free school lunches for all primary children no matter where they live.
attributes.additional_details: Some children don't have the money. Everyone deserves a full meal.
attributes.background: Fund school lunches with tax money in primary school.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Increase free school meal budget for all schools:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643288
